title: Issue with star guardian quizz
body: you guys give an icon with the Starguardian quizz completed but it doesn't send it to my league account at all idk if i'm the only one getting that issue but it make me sad Q-Q

replies.body:
Hey! 

Which guardian did you get? ^-^ It can take up to a week for the icon to be granted to your account (there are so many people taking the quiz!) Please hang tight!
Did you read the disclaimer? It said that it might take 2-3 days to receive the icon.
